name: Von Essen Consulting
tag_list: global-management-consultancy, organisational-design, business-transformation, technological-consulting, managed-services, advisory-services, outsourcing
overview:
Von Essen Consulting is a Global Management Consultancy firm, offering services to contractors working abroad and employers with its workforce based internationally.

Von Essen consulting offers a wide range of services to their clients and have access to market expertise based both locally and international. With access to experts from across industry sectors Von Essen is ideally placed to meet the demands of its customers, wherever in the world they may be. Areas Von Essen Consulting can get involved in include organisational design, business transformation, technological consulting, managed services, advisory services and outsourcing.
